speaker: Prince Gog
message: My dearest, did I regale you with my most recent triumph of fly hunting? Absolutely smashing, a real life and death moment. We had set out for Hexsel's Hollow, the darkest dankest corner of my palatial estate and the finest dragonfly hunting grounds in the Frog Kingdoms... [i]RIBBIT[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: No offense taken I hope my dear lady. Crumpit, my trusted servant who is just truly awful to look upon, had rode ahead and set up a delightful camp from which to stage a proper princely hunt through Hexsel's bowels.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Now of course no camp is complete without a passel of delightful dipping sauces.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: My love no trip is complete without a good spread, we had dijon mustard, honey mustard, spicy brown mustard, german tavern mustard, whole seed mustard...

speaker: Prince Gog
message: ...mayonnaise, miracle whip, horseradish, famous toads bbq sauce, spicy relish, sweet relish, and of course both catsup and ketchup.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Anyway after we had taken inventory of the jars we set out on the horses for a fine afternoon upon the bogs and moors.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Now of course all of this made quite a mess of our horses, but luckily I'm dilligent as you well know.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: A Prince deserves a well groomed horse. Crumpit was not allowed so much as a lick of the honey mustard until he had shod our horses, combed their beautiful manes. I take good care of my horses you know, their empty gaze reminds me of dear mother.

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Oh mother, how I do miss you, you know I actually took one of my poems and set it to music, shall I sing it for you?

speaker: Prince Gog
message: I have the best idea! Try this!

speaker: narrator
message: [i]He calls forth a nearby servant lousy with knapsacks and exorcises a small jar deep from one. As he unscrews the cap, you see the faint shadow of it's contents departing this plane. He mimes sticking his finger in.[/i]

speaker: narrator
message: [i]Reluctantly, you stick your finger in the jar. Gog's smile is unwavering. His pupils tremor slightly.[/i]

speaker: narrator
message: [i]You place your finger in your mouth, carefully avoiding your tongue.[/i]

speaker: Prince Gog
message: Ghuruk gha be my uncle! A kindred spirit for pickled glurp!

speaker: narrator
message: [i]Gog spins around and struts off, giggling. You remove your finger from your mouth.[/i]
